traceability.evidence: • Tests referencing the story (filter-by-age.test.js, cli-options-helpers.test.js, cli.flags.test.js, cli.config-file.test.js, functional-assessment.test.js) all pass under `vitest run` (165 tests, 0 failures). • CLI help text in bin/dry-aged-deps.js includes “--min-age= Minimum age in days (1-365) for including versions (default: 7)”. • parseOptions and parseMinAgeFlag in src/cli-options.js and src/cli-options-helpers.js implement the --min-age flag with validation (1–365). • loadConfigFile in src/config-loader.js reads minAge from .dry-aged-deps.json; tests cover valid, invalid, missing, unknown keys, custom config-file name. • Defaults to 7 days when no flag/config provided; CLI flag overrides config; both prod and dev thresholds supported and shown in JSON output’s summary.thresholds.
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for story 005.0 (CLI flag, config file support, override precedence, default behavior, validation, help documentation, output messages including thresholds) are fully implemented and covered by passing tests.
